column4: what ways are there to call extra shells? someone was at my PC yesterday and he had an extra shell which looked different than the normal xterm, what could it be?,
probaly just a different termianl app - possibly Eterm or urxvt or aterm or... whatever
it should all be in the history of my PC, shouldn't it?
little late, so then my friend probably used some sort of "my commands won't be detected-shell"
